main event: A witness observed a white light in South Dartmouth, Massachusetts, on April 30, 1967, that flew silently, hovered, and then shot off rapidly.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5-10 seconds., The light appeared to be on a level with or just below the tree tops., The conclusion of the report stated the cause was unknown., Witness described its motion as slow to the right, then stopped, hovered again, and moved to the left., The light was bright enough to illuminate surrounding trees and houses.
witness description: The witness reported being a student who appeared intelligent and sincere, aged 15.
